title: Weighing Financial Options as Layoffs Loom
text:
A Texas oil executive knew layoffs were coming at his company, amid the recent energy-market woes. But he didnâ€™t know if his job would be on the chopping block.
Two years from his planned retirement, the 58-year-old was worried that a layoff and severance deal would leave him underprepared. He needed to draw $11,000 a month in retirement to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
